name: American University in Dubai
academic_year: September to May (September-December; January-May); also summer sessions (May-June; July-August)
accrediting_agency: Commission on College (COC) of the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools (SACS); Commission for Academic Accreditation, Ministry of Higher Education and Scientific Research, UAE (CAA-MOHESR); International Assembly for Collegiate Business Education (IACBE); Accreditation Board for Engineering and Technology (ABET) for Civil, Computer and Electrical Engineering
